articles.title: No budget for assisted dying service, health secretary says - BBC
articles.description: The MP for Ilford North pledges to work "constructively" on technical aspects of the legislation.
articles.content:
Health Secretary Wes Streeting has said there is no budget for an assisted dying service, which MPs narrowly backed in a landmark vote on Friday.
Streeting, who was one of the most senior opponents … [+4737 chars]

articles.author: David Nield
articles.title: Scientists Beamed Light Right Through a Man's Head For The First Time - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Scientists have developed a new technique for non-invasive brain imaging – and it involves shining light all the way through the head, from one side to the other.
articles.content:
Scientists have developed a new technique for non-invasive brain imaging and it involves shining light all the way through the head, from one side to the other.
